nome: Yankee-kun na Yamada-kun to Megane-chan to Majo

metadata_completo.titulo_oficial: Yankee-kun na Yamada-kun to Megane-chan to Majo
metadata_completo.sinopse:
The official website for the Yamada-kun and the Seven Witches television anime series revealed on Sunday that the anime's first Blu-ray Disc and DVD box sets will include a Yankee-kun to Megane-chan collaborative manga and anime. 

(Source: ANN)
